name: @cosmos-kit/exodus
description: @cosmos-kit/exodus is the Exodus integration for CosmosKit
author: devs@exodus.io

scripts.build:cjs: yarn tsc -p tsconfig.json --outDir dist --module commonjs || true
scripts.build:mjs: yarn tsc -p tsconfig.json --outDir mjs --module es2022 --declaration false || true
scripts.clean: npm run clean:mjs && npm run clean:dist
scripts.build:rename: publish-scripts --cmd rename --srcDir mjs --outDir dist --findExt js --replaceExt mjs --no-rmDir
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run build:cjs && npm run build:mjs && npm run build:rename && npm run clean:mjs
